quote1text: The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
quote2text: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
quote3text: Your time is limited, so don't waste it living someone else's life. Don't be trapped by dogma – which is living with the results of other people's thinking.
quote4text: If life were predictable it would cease to be life, and be without flavor.
quote5text: If you look at what you have in life, you'll always have more. If you look at what you don't have in life, you'll never have enough.
quote6text: If you set your goals ridiculously high and it's a failure, you will fail above everyone else's success.
quote7text: Life is what happens when you're busy making other plans.
quote8text: Spread love everywhere you go. Let no one ever come to you without leaving happier.
quote9text: When you reach the end of your rope, tie a knot in it and hang on.
quote10text: Always remember that you are absolutely unique. Just like everyone else.
quote11text: Don't judge each day by the harvest you reap but by the seeds that you plant.
quote12text: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
quote13text: Tell me and I forget. Teach me and I remember. Involve me and I learn.
quote14text: The best and most beautiful things in the world cannot be seen or even touched — they must be felt with the heart.
quote15text: It is during our darkest moments that we must focus to see the light.
quote16text: Whoever is happy will make others happy too.
quote17text: Do not go where the path may lead, go instead where there is no path and leave a trail.
quote18text: You will face many defeats in life, but never let yourself be defeated.
quote19text: The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
quote20text: In the end, it's not the years in your life that count. It's the life in your years.
quote21text: Never let the fear of striking out keep you from playing the game.
quote22text: Life is either a daring adventure or nothing at all.
quote23text: Many of life's failures are people who did not realize how close they were to success when they gave up.
quote24text: You have brains in your head. You have feet in your shoes. You can steer yourself any direction you choose.
quote25text: If life were predictable it would cease to be life and be without flavor.
quote26text: In the end, it's not the years in your life that count. It's the life in your years.
quote27text: Life is a succession of lessons which must be lived to be understood.
quote28text: You will face many defeats in life, but never let yourself be defeated.
quote29text: Never let the fear of striking out keep you from playing the game.
quote30text: Life is never fair, and perhaps it is a good thing for most of us that it is not.
quote31text: The only impossible journey is the one you never begin.
quote32text: In this life we cannot do great things. We can only do small things with great love.
quote33text: Only a life lived for others is a life worthwhile.
quote34text: The purpose of our lives is to be happy.
quote35text: Life is what happens when you're busy making other plans.
quote36text: You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough.
quote37text: Live in the sunshine, swim the sea, drink the wild air.
quote38text: Go confidently in the direction of your dreams! Live the life you've imagined.
quote39text: The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
quote40text: Life is really simple, but we insist on making it complicated.
